name: Corona Killer
description:
This is my first attempt to make a fully playable game start to finish.  

How to play:

  • Arrows - move
  • 'M' - hide/show minimap
  • 'X' - Shoot
  • 'ESC' - Pause

Mind your starting ammo.

This is a never ending game. 

ps. Assets are not made by me, and are owned by their artists. I will update this text with names/links where I found those free or non-free assets.

Disclaimer: This is a game -- IN REAL LIFE DO NOT KILL THE INFECTED - take care of them!
